name: Simple RPG (iRgamer)
description:
My first attempt on creating a basic RPG game, inspired by Ye Olde Knights Of Yore Deathmatch (Yokoy DM) and also learning how to make AI using blueprint. 

The game starts of with you living your daily life until goblins starts stealing your chickens, adventure awaits! we have goblins for you to chase, a lost brother and a dragon. Every RPG needs a dragon

A stepping stone to go for something bigger like cyberpunk 2077 or baldur's gate 3.

one can only dream
